name: 李信明
objective: The aim of this course is to serve as a bridge that enables students to immerse themselves in the context of English and simultaneously make them proficient enough to prepare for the TOEIC-to-be
schedule:
Week One: Introduction and Orientation 
Week Two: questoins from 101-120
Week Three: questions from 121-40
Week Four: Questions 141-60
Week Five: Quiz 
Week Six: Questions 161-80
Week Seven: Questons 181-200
Week Eight: Review 
Week Nine: Mid-term 
Week Ten: Unit 2
Week Eleven: Questions 121~140
Week Twelve: Questions 141~160
Week Thirteen: Questions 161~180
Week Fourteen: Quetions 181~200
Week Fifteen: Quiz
Week Sixteen: Review 
Week Seventeen: Review (II)
Week Eighteen: Final
scorePolicy:
Mid-Term: 30%
Final: 30%
Attendance and class performance: 40%
